head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GELLMAN, RUTH PSATY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GELLMAN, RUTH PSATY

abstract.p: Marek Ponichtera My Job column, written with Marcin Skomial, on working as building superintendent; photo (M)

block.p: GELLMAN-Ruth Psaty, 65. Of Irvington, NY, died September 4, 2000. Wife of the late Arthur Gellman. Survivors include two daughters Michelle Gellman and Jeanne Gellman-Goyenechea and a cousin Mary Gilbert. Funeral service Thursday, 11:30AM. EdwardsDowdle Funeral Home, 64 Ashford Ave., (exit 17 Saw Mill) Dobbs Ferry. Memorials to Emma Lazarus Chapter Hadassah, 515 Broadway, Dobbs Ferry, New York 10522.
